Class GUIComponents

java.lang.Object
GUIComponents
public class GUIComponents extends Object
static class used as a helper class by GUI class to create the GUI components

    • setStaticComponents

      public static void setStaticComponents​(Container container)
      This method creates all the static UI components of the application
      Parameters:

    • setRouteScrollPane

      public static void setRouteScrollPane​(Container container, PathDisplay travellingPath)
      Creates the scroll pane for displaying the path
      Parameters:
      container - content pane of the JFrame calling this method
      travellingPath - PathDisplay to be put inside the scroll pane
